name: Coco Returns!
description:
Coco Returns!

Coco has come back stronger than ever, help Coco to overcome his fears and escape from the dungeons, find the gate to the freedom. But take care, many dangers will await you: different types of enemies, transporters, secret doors, sliding blocks...

Reach the exit and escape!
This is a new release of Coco, our first video game, which includes great new features

  • New control system: touchscreen or mouse
  • Online scoreboards and achievements: Compete against other players!
  • Graphic restyling, new scenarios and character's designs
  • New gameplay elements and powerups
  • 40 new levels will surprise you for its originality and increasing difficulty
  • Two different initial difficulty levels, Normal and Inferno.
  • ChromaDepth displaying system: Put your ChromaDepth(*) glasses on and enjoy of a 3D visualization that will transport you to the Coco´s world. Yes!, without extra hardware!. And if you don´t have any ChromaDepth glasses you can also play Coco in 2D mode
  • First release for Android Tablets and Mobiles
  • Enjoy the soundtrack remake 

Innovative 2+3D displaying style video game!

With this innovative displaying technicle applying to videogaming we want transmit a new atmosphere to "Coco returns".

You can play "Coco returns", either in 2D mode or in 3D mode using the ChromaDepth® glasses. Because of that we informally has called it 2D+3D displaying.

All backgrounds and characters has been carefully designed to get adventage of the 3D possibilities and get the bests visual effects for players and viewers.

Demo online Available, click here to access!!
